name: Super Idol Kart
description:
Mario Kart.....a game that everyone loves. But what if...just if.....it was replaced with the song, super idol? So, Super idol was a song created on June 18, 2004, created by Nicholas Teo, and sung on TikTok by douyin user Zmcmtianyiming.  Now,  Let's talk about Mario Kart. Mario Kart is a platformer racing game created on August 27, 1992, by Nintendo Entertainment Planning & Development or for short, Nintendo. So, then, what is Super Idol Kart? Super Idol Kart is a platformer racing game created on Febuary 2, 2022, by Anh Tran Duy Thach and Meba Fasil. Now...Today....BEHOLD SUPER IDOL KART!

Developers:

Bryan Bui/Hebowes/Obama Minion - Co-Creator of Project | Creating almost All Media For the Project

Anh Tran Duy Thach/ObungUS/Obama Minion.EXE - Main Creator of both the media and the Script

Meba Fasil  - Co-Creator of the Script

People That Have Helped Contribute to the Project:

Aizen Seui

Noe Sanchez

Sebastian Gomez

Makayla Keys

Demetrius Cannon

Marc Abalos
